byline: Lizzie O'Leary, Mark Garrison, Dan Weissmann, Sabri Ben-Achour, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Steve Rosenberg and Carmen Wong Ulrich
title: Marketplace for Friday, November 29, 2013
teaser: Marketplace’s Sabri Ben-Achour braves the holiday shopping crowds to find out how opening on Thanksgiving Day affected this year’s sales figures. Plus, a look at how U.S. taxpayers are close to getting back all the money they put into the housing giants. Marketplace host Lizzie O’Leary talks with Bloomberg Government’s Nela Richardson and Cardiff Garcia from FT Alphaville for a wrap-up of the week’s business news. And, a lot of fans are calling for USC’s interim head football coach to take the top job permanently, especially after their upset of Stanford a few weeks ago. But as Marketplace’s Mark Garrison reports, that may not necessarily be the case.
